en: restore us again by the repose of sleep
after the fatigue of our daily work,
so that, continually renewed by your help,
we may serve you in body and soul.
la: quiete nos rursum per soporem recreare
tibi servire possimus corpore et anima.

en: be gracious and forgive the sins of your people.
Free us from the bonds of darkness
and let us enter into your light
la: propitius esto et dimitte peccata populi tui.
et fac nos introire in lucem tuam
